comments: I have a UML2 model open (containing a model and some profiles...), then I close Eclipse and start it again. When it tries to reload the UML2 editor view I get a ResourceException.
I was unable to reproduce this problem for a simple model I had created. Please attach your model (or a representative sample) and the stack trace.

In the attached project open the LibraryModel.uml from the model directory and close Eclipse and start again while leaving the editor open.

The stack trace is 
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.impl.ResourceSetImpl$1$DiagnosticWrappedException: org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource /Dokumente und Einstellungen/Snowball/oawschulung/oaw4.workshop.library.generator/model/LibraryModel.uml does not exist.
